text: Hut in the Woods (, ) is a 2011 German drama film directed by Hans Weingartner. == Cast == * Peter Schneider - Martin * Timur Massold - Viktor * - Lena * Eleonore Weisgerber - Doctor * Andreas Leupold - Martin's father * - Banker * - Personalchef * Julia Jentsch - Petra == References == == External links == * Category:2011 drama films Category:German films Category:German drama films
title: Hut in the Woods
